mapper.select: SELECT u.id id, u.student_number studentNumber, u.password, u.name, u.phone, u.sex, u.college, u.major, u.position, u.head_pic headPic from user_association ua left JOIN user u on ua.user_id = u.id where association_id = #{aid} and status = 1 order by position

SELECT u.id id, u.student_number studentNumber, u.password, u.name, u.phone, u.sex, u.college, u.major, u.position, u.head_pic headPic from user_association ua left JOIN user u on ua.user_id = u.id where association_id = #{aid} and status = 0 order by position
SELECT u.province name,COUNT(*) value FROM user_association LEFT JOIN user u on user_id = u . id where association_id=#{associationId} and status='1' GROUP BY province
SELECT u.province name,COUNT(*) value FROM user_association LEFT JOIN user u on user_id = u . id where association_id=#{associationId} and status='1' and sex='男' GROUP BY province
SELECT u.province name,COUNT(*) value FROM user_association LEFT JOIN user u on user_id = u . id where association_id=#{associationId} and status='1' and sex='女' GROUP BY province
